/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The street is flanked by lush greenery on both sides, with trees and shrubs dotting the landscape. Power lines stretch across the scene, connecting the buildings that can be seen in the distance. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the urban setting. The image is captured from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the vegetation contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
